"Gunslashes":
"Gunslashes are special hybrid weapons that allow you to switch between melee and ranged attacks.

<%WeaponActionText>: Switch between melee and ranged modes."
"Try basic Gunslash melee attacks and Photon Arts for yourself. Though it has no special strong points, it is quick on the attack and easy to use."
"Try basic Gunslash ranged attacks for yourself. The convenience of being able to make ranged attacks without changing equipment is its best feature."
